products.title: Splash Tango Orange Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tango is a beautiful dark rusty orange colour, it will work perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.title: Splash Bright Orange Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Contemporary and stylish, their moisture-resistant splash bright orange electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This cheerful orange electric roller is a beautiful, warm-toned colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space.

products.title: Bella Blackout Tango Orange Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This saturated orange electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Bright Orange Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This vibrant bright orange electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Musa Tigerlily Orange Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Enliven your interior with the musa tigerlily electric roller blind. This blind features a stylised, woodland graphic that really stands out thanks to the warm and vivid orange colour. Simple yet eye-catching, this fabric blind will add a memorable accent colour to any minimalist space, plus the electric design makes it super easy to operate as well as being totally on-trend.
